resources.string:
New beta release is available!! For details see http://www.cadpage.org/faq/cadpage-2-0
 Updated 02/25/2019
 
 v2.0.7-4
 Location Fixes:
 Bibb County, AL
 Marshall County, AL
 Warren County, PA
 Augusta County, VA
 
 v2.0.7-3
 Location Fixes:
 Baltimore County, MD
 Washtenaw County, MI
 Yadkin County, NC
 Montgomery County, PA
 Loudoun County, VA
 
 General Fixes:
 Crash processing MMS messages with Samsung Messages
 
 v2.0.7-2 (beta only)
 Moved the logic and permissions required to make outgoing phone calls to the message support app.
 
 v2.0.7-1
 New Locations:
 Rankin County, MS
 
 Vermillion County, IN
 Location Fixes:
Calvert County, MD
 Montcalm County, MI
 Greenville County, SC
 
 v2.0.6-4
 General Fixes:
 Turned off prompt to install support message app from play store as it is no longer available there.
